mapper.select: SELECT SNS_LIKE SNSLIKE, SNS_POSTS_NUMBER POSTNUMBER,SNS_HATE SNSHATE FROM SNS_LIKE_HATE_COUNTER WHERE SNS_POSTS_NUMBER=#{postNumber} AND SNS_LIKE_HATE_MEMBER_ID=#{memberId}
mapper.update: UPDATE SNS_LIKE_HATE_COUNTER SET SNS_LIKE=1,SNS_HATE=null WHERE SNS_POSTS_NUMBER=#{postNumber} AND SNS_LIKE_HATE_MEMBER_ID=#{memberId}
